role.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
role.subtitle: React | TypeScript | Tailwind CSS | Design Systems | UX | DX

summary: Senior Frontend Engineer with 15+ years of experience pioneered in building scalable, high-performance web applications. Expert in React, Typescript, and front-end architecture, with a focus on UX, developer experience, design system scalability, and performance optimization. Proven record of leading cross-functional teams, reducing technical debt, developing pixel perfect UI and accelerating product delivery. Currently residing in Dubai and immediately available for hiring.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
details: Led and managed front-end technology at Silkhaus, including a successful transformation to modern build tools like Vite, reducing build times by 40%.
Boosted website performance by reducing page load time by 30% through route level code splitting and lazy loading.
Designed a React â€“ Tailwind â€“ Storybook design system, enhancing feature delivery speed by 20% and minimizing UI rework.
Implemented Arabic language support, ensuring proper bidirectional behavior.
Launched and integrated Payload CMS, drastically reducing developer dependency by 60% and facilitating autonomous content management for non-technical teams.
Established frontend engineering standards with CI/CD checks, linting, and testing pipelines, enhancing code quality and release reliability.
Involved in feature discussion right from wireframes and mockups until implementation and deployment.
Manage and mentored a remote team, streamlining code reviews for efficient and maintainable releases.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Improved design consistency by 25% by automating design-token synchronization between GitHub and Figma.
Directed the Material UI v4 to v5 migration, collaborating across multiple squads to achieve zero-downtime roll out.
Embedded Datadog metrics in CI pipelines improving code health visibility across teams.
Being part of the UI platform team, advocated for front-end best practices across teams, fostering a culture of maintainable and scalable UI architecture.

experience.title: Senior Programmer
details: Modernized a legacy Knockout.js e-commerce platform by architecting a full React-based rebuild, improving scalability and UX.
Integrated Stripe Payments (Credit Card, iDEAL, Giropay) for EU markets, increasing checkout conversion by 20%.
Acted as the main point of contact between my development team in Dubai and management team in Copenhagen to streamline sprint communication and improve delivery predictability.
Introduced code reviews and linting standards, improving overall code maintainability and on-boarding experience.

experience.title: Senior Programmer
details: Built VoiceReach, an AngularJS-based outreach platform for BPO teams, improving call efficiency and campaign management.

experience.title: Software Engineering Sr. Analyst
details: Delivered responsive retail website, ensuring mobile optimization and UX consistency.

experience.title: Senior Programmer
details: Worked on development of many e-learning products to help kids of different age groups learn Maths and Science.

personal_project.name: Shinobi Sprint
personal_project.description: An endless side-scrolling ninja runner game built with Vite, TypeScript, and PixiJS. Leveraged AI-assisted coding in Cursor IDE to streamline development and boost productivity.
